results.title: [Effect of atenolol and nitroglycerin ointment on exertion tolerance in coronary disease].
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Ataxia_Telangiectasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001260 @@@S-T depression@@@ was reduced at maximal comparable exercise level by 49% after @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, 52% after @CHEMICAL_Nitroglycerin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005996 @@@nitroglycerin@@@ ointment and 76% after combination of the two (P less than 0.05).

citations.NLM: Koenig W, Diehm C. [Effect of atenolol and nitroglycerin ointment on exertion tolerance in coronary disease]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 1983 Nov 25;108(47):1798-803. PMID: 6416805
citations.BibTeX: @article{6416805, title={[Effect of atenolol and nitroglycerin ointment on exertion tolerance in coronary disease].}, author={Koenig W and Diehm C}, journal={Dtsch Med Wochenschr}, volume={108}, number={47}, pages={1798-803}}

results.title: Reduction in infarct size, arrhythmias and chest pain by early intravenous beta blockade in suspected acute myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with ECG changes indicative of @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarction@@@ at entry, i.v. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ significantly reduced enzyme release by one-third and enhanced R-wave preservation.

citations.NLM: Yusuf S, Sleight P, Rossi P, Ramsdale D, Peto R, Furze L, Sterry H, Pearson M, Motwani R, Parish S, Gray R, Bennett D, Bray C. Reduction in infarct size, arrhythmias and chest pain by early intravenous beta blockade in suspected acute myocardial infarction. Circulation. 1983 Jun;67(6 Pt 2):I32-41. PMID: 6851037
